Mod Used 

KJR (Without you can add struts for make the plane more stable)

Tac Fuel Balancer

Karbonite

**VERY IMPORTANT**

Use Staging only the first time you activate Turbojet-Engines, after **Use Only Action Groups**, activate SRB with staging make your plane uncontrollable.

**Re-Entry**

From Low Orbit (100km-140km) put PE to 70km and pitch at 45Ã‚Â° for aerobraking, at 20km altitude harvest few karbonite (put 1 eye on battery level) for use engine on landing fase , if you like you can disable RW and use trim for approach phase. 

**Take-Off**

Refill all the tanks, close solar panel, activate RW, and retract Ladders, Open Karbonite Harvest and start climb with only turbojet Engines at 45Ã‚Â° pitch.

30km Altitude pitch 30Ã‚Â°, activate LV-N and wait 1000m/s speed for activate RAT-SRB, reach 70km AP and shutdown Turbojet, transfer all fuel from central karbonite tank to SRB (use TAc fuel balancer or something similar) and continue climb for reach a stable low orbit.

If you do all right you end with 700dv~ left
